extensionDescription.message: Smart Copilot for Internet Surfing, smart assistant for browsing the web

textareaPlaceholder.message: Enter your message and press Enter to send

settingsDomainDescription.message: This is the complete request address of the background service, for example: https://api.openai.com/v1

settingsModelTypeDescription.message: The Ollama service needs to be started with the command: 'OLLAMA_ORIGINS=chrome-extension://* ollama serve'

settingsOllamaModelTypeDescription.message: 需要使用 OLLAMA_ORIGINS=chrome-extension://* ollama serve 命令启动 Ollama 服务

settingsModelDescription.message: This is the model name of the background service, for example: davinci, which needs to be obtained from the background service.

settingsModelNameOllamaDescription.message: not all models support the chat mode

settingsApikeyDescription.message: This is the request secret key of the background service, for example: sk-xxxxxx, which needs to be obtained from the background service.

settingsApikeyError.message: Please enter a valid API Key.

summaryDescription.message: Summarize the main content of the current page.

settingsSystemPromptDescription.message: This prompt only works in AI conversations

settingsSummatyPromptDescription.message: This prompt only works on the summary button function
